AIInsightFeedback.name: AIInsightFeedback
AIInsightFeedback.description: Represents an Einstein prediction insight feedback.

ActualValue.description: The raw feedback value. This field is null when no recommendation is selected.

AiFeedback.description: The feedback user sentiment. Possible values are: Negative—Negative feedback Neutral—Neutral feedback Positive—Positive feedback

AiInsightFeedbackType.description: The nature of the feedback. Possible values are: Explicit—Explicit feedback. For example, a user applies and saves an Einstein recommendation on a case. Implicit—Implicit feedback. For example, a user edits or updates a case field without viewing or applying field recommendations from Einstein.

AiRecordInsightId.description: The unique ID of the associated AIRecordInsight.

ValueId.description: The unique ID of the associated AIInsightValue.
